# intCPUE

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Overview

`intCPUE` provides an integrated, TMB-based framework for CPUE standardization with spatial and spatiotemporal SPDE random fields and optional smooth terms.

## Installation

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("YOUR_GITHUB/intCPUE")
```

## Quick example

```r
library(intCPUE)
# fit <- intCPUE(formula, data, ...)
```
